dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 244 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 244) entitled An Act to encourage effective, voluntary investments to recruit, employ, and retain men and women who have served in the United States military with annual Federal awards to employers recognizing such efforts, and for other purposes., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: On page 9, line 19, strike (b) Unlawful display prohibited.â€”.
On page 12, lines 18 through 19, strike , as defined in such section.
